config_part.ioc_details: 3D Vector Magnet System from Scientific Magnetics

macro.name: LVDCOM_OPTIONS
macro.description: Options that define how the VI is started. Add selected options together to make the final value. 1 - warn if idle, 2 - start if idle, 4 - stop VIs if started on exit, 6 - stop VI on exit. (Default 1)

macro.name: LVDCOM_HOST
macro.description: Host on which the vi is running, blank for localhost (Default '')
